item.title: Saturday Morning Session
item.description: The Saturday Morning Session of the October 2015 General Conference.

item.title: Guide Us, O Thou Great Jehovah
item.description: The Mormon Tabernacle Choir sings “Guide Us, O Thou Great Jehovah.”

item.title: President Dieter F. Uchtdorf
item.description: President Dieter F. Uchtdorf's address at the October 2015 General Conference.

item.title: Elder M. Russell Ballard
item.description: Elder M. Russell Ballard's address at the October 2015 General Conference.

item.title: Elder Larry R. Lawrence
item.description: Elder Larry R. Lawrence's address at the October 2015 General Conference.

item.title: God Will Help You: Veme
item.description: God will help you make of yourself something greater than you ever thought possible. —Dieter F. Uchtdorf

item.title: God's Plan Is in Place: Veme
item.description: God's plan is in place. He is at the helm, and His great and powerful ship flows toward salvation and exaltation. —M. Russell Ballard

item.title: Temple-Worthy Lives: Veme
item.description: "Living and maintaining temple-worthy lives will hold together all that really matters." —Quentin L. Cook

item.title: Saturday Afternoon Session
item.description: The Saturday Afternoon Session of the October 2015 General Conference.

item.title: Elder Jeffrey R. Holland
item.description: Elder Jeffrey R. Holland's address at the October 2015 General Conference.

item.title: Elder Bradley D. Foster
item.description: Elder Bradley D. Foster's address at the October 2015 General Conference.

item.title: Dating and Marriage Are the Gateway: Veme
item.description: "Dating and marriage aren’t final destinations. They are the gateway to where you ultimately want to go." —Robert D. Hales

item.title: Selfless Love: Veme
item.description: No love in mortality comes closer to approximating the pure love of Jesus Christ than the selfless love a devoted mother has for her child. —Jeffrey R. Holland

item.title: General Priesthood Session
item.description: The General Priesthood Session of the October 2015 General Conference.

item.title: Elder Neil L. Andersen
item.description: Elder Neil L. Andersen's address at the October 2015 General Conference.

item.title: Elder Randall K. Bennett
item.description: Elder Randall K. Bennett's address at the October 2015 General Conference.

item.title: President Dieter F. Uchtdorf
item.description: President Dieter F. Uchtdorf's address at the October 2015 General Conference.

item.title: President Henry B. Eyring
item.description: President Henry B. Eyring's address at the October 2015 General Conference.

item.title: President Thomas S. Monson
item.description: President Thomas S. Monson's address at the October 2015 General Conference.

item.title: Faith Never Demands: Veme
item.description: Faith never demands an answer to every question but seeks the assurance and courage to move forward. —Neil L. Andersen

item.title: Choose to Believe: Veme
item.description: "We can choose to believe. For in belief, we discover the dawn of light. We will discover truth. We will find peace." —Dieter F. Uchtdorf

item.title: Pray to Know His Will: Veme
item.description: "You can pray to know His will, and with the honest desire to do whatever He asks you to do, you will receive an answer." —Henry B. Eyring

item.title: Follow God's Commandments: Veme
item.description: "Our greatest happiness in this life will come as we follow God’s commandments and obey His laws!" —Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Nothing Will Change His Love for You: Veme
item.description: "There is no choice, sin, or mistake that you or anyone else can make that will change His love for you or for them." —Ronald A. Rasband

item.title: He Rejoices When We Do What is Right: Veme
item.description: ”God is our loving Heavenly Father. We are His children. He weeps with us when we suffer and rejoices when we do what is right.” —Gary E. Stevenson

item.title: See Others Through Heavenly Father's Eyes: Veme
item.description: "To effectively serve others, we must see them through a parent’s eyes, through Heavenly Father’s eyes." —Dale G. Renlund

item.title: Culminating Act of All Creation: Veme
item.description: "The culminating act of all Creation was the creation of woman!" —Russell M. Nelson

item.title: Truths That Mark the Way Home: Veme
item.description: "The truths that mark the way home to God are verified by the Holy Ghost." —Henry B. Eyring

item.title: Sunday Afternoon Session
item.description: The Sunday Afternoon Session of the October 2015 General Conference.

item.title: God's Ultimate Purpose: Veme
item.description: "God’s ultimate purpose is our progress." —D. Todd Christofferson

item.title: Hear and Heed: Veme
item.description: "May we hear and heed the eternal truths taught by the Lord’s authorized representatives." —David A. Bednar

item.description: God will help you make of yourself something greater than you ever thought possible. —Dieter F. Uchtdorf

item.title: Family: One Big Experiment
item.description: The Oh family prefers to work on their chemistry while literally working on chemistry. They create a dry ice solution that will freeze household objects like candy, bottles, and even flowers.

item.title: Pizza with the Puentes
item.description: The Puentes have learned to channel the energy of their home into family chores and activities that are both fun and productive. One of their favorite activities is pizza making in their backyard.

item.title: Raising a Family: Learning the Ropes Together
item.description: Christy, Jay, and their four kids are experts at all sorts of interesting things, but they know their success outside of the home is actually the result of success within the home.

item.title: A Family Culture of Love
item.description: Meet the Pereira family. They love soccer, animals, and making bread because each of those things brings them closer together. Find out how in this episode of Happy Families.

item.title: Blending Families: Love is Key
item.description: Love is the key—that is the motto the Goodjohn family lives by. Whether they are at home or at the park, you can bet that Nandi, Troy, and his daughter Dior are doing their best to show each other how much they care.

item.title: Apostle Testimony Montage
item.description: Apostles are called to be special witnesses of Jesus Christ. Hear the first testimonies of the First Presidency and the Quorum of the Twelve after being called to their sacred roles.

item.title: Fast Offerings: A Simple Commandment with a Marvelous Promise
item.description: Excerpt from President Henry B. Erying’s talk “Is Not This the Fast That I Have Chosen?” He discusses the blessings of the fast and the story of a humble woman who pays a generous fast offering.
